column4: Stupid question:  What is an easy way to run programs that aren't listed under applications?
Why can't there be a list?  I'm expected to remember the exact names/spelling?
are the linux drivers any good
so far so good.  Haven't been able to launch a game yet lol
do you haveany lag on the desktop?
are you using official driver or os driver , also 32bit or 64bit ubuntu?
i don't know what you mean by official or os
the ati drivers or the open source driver?
